mobileResponsivenessTip: Optimize images and reduce large file sizes to improve mobile performance.
loadingSpeedTip: Minimize JavaScript and CSS files, and leverage browser caching.
seoOptimizationTip: Implement structured data (schema markup) and improve meta tags for better search visibility.
userExperienceTip: Improve the navigation menu for easier access to key sections.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking process by reducing the number of steps and providing more visible call-to-action buttons.
tips: Ensure contact information is prominently displayed on the site.
Consider adding live chat support for better user engagement.
whatThisWebsiteDoesInOneLine: We found that your website provides information and booking services for The Prospect Hollywood hotel.
